channel.title: How to get adobe flash && Play Runescape on your iPhone,iPod touch, iPad
channel.description:
[size=18pt][b]Use Adobe Flash[/b][/size] [size=24px][b][url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=EKapv4iTbjc][/size][size=x-small][b]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=EKapv4iTbjc[/b][/size][size=24px] [/size]
[size=18pt][b]Play RuneScape[/b][/size] [b][url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=a56zsx1HosU][size=x-small]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=a56zsx1HosU[/size][/url][/b]
Yes, they're both of my videos.

item.title: How to get adobe flash && Play Runescape on your iPhone,iPod touch, iPad
item.dc:creator: @abatssk8ter abatssk8ter
item.description:
@abatssk8ter wrote:

[quote=“rip4d, post:2, topic:347423”]Yup, I use CloudBrowse for that too.

And how did you record directly from your iPhone?[/quote]

My iphones jailbroken, i use screenspltr ;p.

@The Reaper X

Not my account :s, my runescape account is abatssk8ter. i quit after 3months of playin in 2007.

Read full topic

item.title: How to get adobe flash && Play Runescape on your iPhone,iPod touch, iPad
item.dc:creator: @The_Reaper_X The Reaper X
item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

[quote=“Muroth, post:3, topic:347423”]I thought RuneScape used Java.[/quote]The browser supposedly supports both flash and java.

You said in the RS vid that you were using RS as an example for pure educational purposes and that you don’t play the game… You had like 10 friends online during that video… lol…
